books.title: Think and Grow Rich
books.author: Napoleon Hill
books.description: Think and Grow Rich has been called the “Granddaddy of All Motivational Literature.” It was the first book to boldly ask, “What makes a winner?”

books.title: Ego Is the Enemy
books.author: Ryan Holiday
books.description: Many of us insist the main impediment to a full, successful life is the outside world. In fact, the most common enemy lies within: our ego
